18:45 <coud> hi, xwiki-commons-component-default link on http://rendering.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/GettingStarted should probably point to http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-component-default/ . Now it displays 404 at github  
18:47 <sdumitriu> has quit  
18:50 <vmassol> coud: thanks, fixing  
18:52 <vmassol> coud: should be ok now :)  
19:04 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
19:29 <coud> vmassol yes now it points to right github location. But the other links point to maven repo. Seems incosistent... :)  
19:38 <vmassol> indeed  
19:41 <vmassol> coud: better? :)  
19:41 <coud> yeah  
19:42 <vmassol> coud: let me know if it's missing anything else to understand XWiki Rendering, I'd be happy to improve the doc

19:44 <sdumitriu> has quit  
19:45 <coud> ok. So far I had no difficulty in understanding doc
